DOC.brief_title: Intralipid Therapy Women 35-40 Years With Positive Natural Killer Cells Undergoing Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI )
DOC.criteria: Subfertile woman age 3540 year repeat implantation failure recurrent miscarriage positive natural killer cell undergoing Intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) cycle . woman 40years less 35 year Disturbances normal fat metabolism pathologic hyperlipidemia , Lipoid nephrosis acute pancreatitis hyperlipidemia . Allergic egg , soybean oil , safflower oil . Severe liver disease , kidney disease , lung disease , anemia , blood coagulation disorder . Uterine fibroid , endometrial polyp , endometriosis hydrosalpinx . Antiphospholipid syndrome ( lupus anticoagulant and/or anticardiolipin antibody ( Immunoglobulin G M ) [ IgG IgM ] ) ; recognise thrombophilic condition ( test accord usual clinic practice ) . Intrauterine abnormality ( assess ultrasound , hysterosonography , hysterosalpingogram , hysteroscopy ) . Fibroids distort uterine cavity . Abnormal parental karyotype .
